name: Drive Away
description:
This is the classic style car vs cop game. This is still in development and only has a DEMO level. Please donate to support the production of this game. Don't forget to join the discord server to get the latest information about the game  https://discord.gg/WGcXt3R. There is also an added BONUS in the level that some may find. 

*HINT* *HINT*

GOAL!!!!
